Thanks for your response. The problem is that it should NOT be 
looking in =
program files. I have a j2sdk1.4.2_06 directory on my 
root C: drive and th=
at is what I am referencing in my JAVA_HOME. I 
even went to what should be=
 an unnecessart step to add the tools.jar 
for this directory to my CLASSPA=
TH property. I am not using 1.5 yet 
since it has not been approved by the =
organization that I work for.

Why when I specifically am pointing to this =
directory on JAVA_HOME 
and the CLASSPATH is it deciding to look in jre1.5.=
0_06\lib down 
under Program Files. It is obviously totally ignoring these =

properties and going on its own hunting expedition. The question is, 
how =
can I get it to stop?
